pullRequest.title: Sensi csv export
pullRequest.bodyText:
The commit message follows our guidelines
 Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)

What kind of change does this PR introduce?
This PR makes it possible to output the results of a sensitivity calculation in CSV format
What is the current behavior?
At  the moment it is only possible to serialize in JSON format.
What is the new behavior?
It is now also possible to export in CSV format.

commit.message:
Add a CSV exporter for the sensitivity results

- TODO: add tests

Signed-off-by: Agnès Leroy <agnes.leroy@rte-france.com>

Add tests for the CSV export of the results

Signed-off-by: Agnès Leroy <agnes.leroy@rte-france.com>

nodes.bodyText: Since you created this class, put yourself as author
You should avoid to log on std/err, use a logger instead.

commit.message:
Fix the copyrights and author info fot the two new files

Signed-off-by: Agnès Leroy <agnes.leroy@rte-france.com>
